entry.title: $2700 // Totally renovated 2BR/ 2Baths in a building - next to 30TH Ave
entry.content:
Totally renovated 2BR / 2baths in a building - 4TH Floor walk up!
Beautiful kitchen with granite counter top, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher
open to a large living area!
Two queen size bedrooms with closets,
in the master bedroom - private modern bathroom with a shower!
Modern full size bathroom from the living room!
Brand new beautiful hard wood floors!
Very sunny and bright apt!
Tenants pay utilities!
No dogs!
Close to 30TH Ave Stop of N&W trains!
Close to all cafes, restaurants, bars and shopping -24/7 open on 30TH Ave and Steinway!

AVAILABLE NOW!

Please, call/text at 917-553-4168 or send an email for appointments!
